articles.author: Max Goldbart
articles.title: Forget ‘Game Of Thrones’: FX’s ‘Shōgun’ Director Compares U.S.-Japanese Epic To A Different HBO Hit - Deadline
articles.description: 'Shōgun' Director Jonathan van Tulleken has talkled 'Game Of Thrones', 'Succession' & the western gaze
articles.content:
Long-awaited FX epic Shōgun, which launches tomorrow, has been compared to HBO epic Game of Thronesby all and sundry, but director Jonathan van Tulleken has different comparators in mind.
While van … [+1873 chars]
